<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Diabolic Certitude](/Feats.aspx?ID=909) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 107 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Hellknight Armiger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=20)

**Prerequisites**
[Hellknight Armiger Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=907)

**Trigger**
Your turn begins and you can observe a devil.

</column>

---

Your Hellknight training drilled details of Hell’s denizens deep into your mind. Make an attempt to Recall Knowledge about a [devil](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=30) you’re observing. If you roll a critical failure on this check, you get a failure instead.
name: Diabolic Certitude
